      POST /users : Create user Creates a new user.
      Specified by:
      createUser in interface UsersApi
      Parameters:
      userRegister - The register details of the user. (required)
      Returns:
      Successfully created user. (status code 201) or Some of the parameters are missing or not valid. (status code 400) or Email is already taken. (status code 409) or Request does not contain any data. (status code 415)

    • getCurrentUser

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserDTO> getCurrentUser()
      Description copied from interface: UsersApi
      GET /users/me : Get current user Retrieves information about the user who is currently authenticated.
      Specified by:
      getCurrentUser in interface UsersApi
      Returns:
      Successfully retrieved information about the user who is currently authenticated. (status code 200) or Some of the parameters are missing or not valid. (status code 400) or Either no access token was provided or the provided access token is invalid or expired. (status code 401)

      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface UsersApi
      Parameters:
      userLogin - The login details of the user. (required)
      Returns:
      Successfully changed users password. (status code 204) or Some of the parameters are missing or not valid. (status code 400) or Request does not contain any data. (status code 415)
